description: The advert by the Scandinavian airline SAS was targeted by online groups and politicians.
title: Scandinavian airline ad pulled after online criticism
title_page: Scandinavian airline ad pulled after online criticism - BBC News
maintext: "I have always flown with SAS a lot but I would have bad taste in my mouth if I did it again because they spit on us like that," the populist Danish People's Party foreign affairs spokesperson Soeren Espersen, told Danish newspaper Ekstra Bladet.
